name: Muscles and the Gun
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 43 - Sacrifices Must Be Made

Muscles' strength is superhuman.

Gun's abilities are unmatched.

Will they be able to pull off one last score... and what will it cost?

Controls:

  • A/D/Left/Right: walk
  • W/Up: Catch a ride/throw
  • S/Down: Get down
  • J/Space: Jump
  • LCtrl/K: Shoot

Joysticks are supported but you’ll have to figure out/configure the buttons yourself.
